items.name: Cooked Vegetables (Okra, Potatoes or Mixed Vegetables)
Okra Tajin
items.description: Chunks of beef and okra baked in a clay pot with tomato and spices. Comes with rice, Orzo Soup, Arabic bread, and green salad.

items.name: Potato Tajin
items.description: Chunks of beef and potato baked in a clay pot with tomato and spices. Comes with rice, Orzo Soup, Arabic bread, and green salad.

items.name: Moussaka Tajin
items.description: Slow-cooked eggplant layered with minced meat, tomatoes, and warm spices, baked in a clay pot. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, and tahini sauce.

items.name: Kebab Tajin
items.description: Chunks of beef cooked with caramelized onions baked in a clay pot. Served with rice, Orzo Soup, Arabic bread, and green salad.

items.name: Molokhia Tajin
items.description: Chunks of beef and green leaves soup baked in a clay pot. Served with rice, Orzo Soup, Arabic bread, and green salad.

items.name: Akawy Tajin
items.description: 4 pieces of slow-cooked oxtail meat baked in a clay pot. Served with rice, Orzo Soup, Arabic bread, and green salad.

items.name: Warak Enab with Kaware3
items.description: Stuffed vine leaves cooked with cow legs baked in a clay pot. Served with rice and green salad.

items.name: Warak Lahmah
items.description: 10 pieces of oven-baked tender beef cooked with bell pepper and onion. Served with rice, Orzo Soup, Arabic bread, and green salad.

items.name: Warak Enab b Akawy Tajin
items.description: Stuffed vine leaves cooked with oxtail meat baked in a clay pot. Served with rice and green salad.

items.name: Lamb Kebab
items.description: 6 pieces of charcoal-grilled marinated lamb kebab with Arabic spices. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Lamb Chops
items.description: 5 pieces of tender lamb chops grilled with Arabic herbs and spices. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Beef Kebab
items.description: 12 pieces of marinated beef kebab grilled for a smoky flavor. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Lamb Chunk with Fattah
items.description: Slow-cooked lamb chunks marinated in spices with fattah and tomato garlic sauce.

items.name: Kofta
items.description: 6 pieces of grilled minced meat served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Beef Sausage
items.description: 8 pieces of homemade beef sausage grilled and served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Tarb
items.description: 4 pieces of grilled minced meat wrapped in thin lamb fat layer for rich flavor. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Mixed Grill (Single)
items.description: 2 kofta, 2 lamb kebab, 3 sausage, 4 chicken wings, grilled to perfection. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Beef Steak
items.description: 3 pieces of beef steak marinated in Arabic spices. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Neifa
items.description: 4 pieces of slow-cooked lamb shoulder marinated in Arabic spices. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Half Chicken Shish
items.description: 6 pieces of marinated chicken served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Half Boneless Chicken
items.description: Half chicken marinated in special in-house blend, served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Quarter Chicken Shish
items.description: 3 pieces of marinated chicken served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Half Chicken Tikka
items.description: Half chicken marinated in Arabic spices. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Shish Tawook
items.description: 8 pieces of boneless chicken marinated in Arabic spices. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Chicken Wings
items.description: 8 pieces of marinated chicken wings served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Stuffed Pigeon (Hamam)
items.description: Whole pigeon stuffed with aromatic rice and spices, slow roasted to perfection. Served with green salad and fries.

items.name: Mixed Grill (2 Persons)
items.description: 4 kofta, 3 lamb kebab, 2 tarb, 4 sausage. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.

items.name: Mixed Grill (4 Persons)
items.description: 8 kofta, 6 lamb kebab, 4 tarb, 8 sausage. Served with Arabic bread, green salad, tahini sauce, and choice of fries or rice.
